rows.label: tev000593_MSG0001
rows.name: Evening, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0002
rows.name: It's rare to see you this late at night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0007
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ask Gwin if he and Mathias are
"enjoying" the nightlife.

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0009
rows.name: Appreciate

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0010
rows.name: Thank Gwin and Mathias for patrolling so late.

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0003
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0004
rows.name: Tell Gwin and Mathias to stay out of trouble.

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0005
rows.name: Whoa, easy! No need for the seedy air quotes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0006
rows.name:
We're just taking a break between some really rough
missions, is all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0011
rows.name:
Aw, that's nice of you to say, but we aren't actually on
duty right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0012
rows.name:
Seriously? Me and Mathias? Do we really look
like we're getting into trouble?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0013
rows.name:
I don't think we have so much as a jaywalking ticket
between us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0014
rows.name:
We just like to get together here and talk when we
both have a night off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0015
rows.name:
Actually, we were just reminiscing about our childhood
dreams.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0016
rows.name:
Mathias wanted to be a race car driver.
Still does, in fact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0017
rows.name:
He's even looking to buy a sports car just so he can
speed around New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0018
rows.name:
I told him if he'd quit the Mediators and join one of
the divisions that leaves the city, he could go four-
wheeling around the plains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0019
rows.name:
But he said he's not the rally-car type—it's gotta be a
sports car or nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0020
rows.name:
So what did you want to be when you were a kid,
[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_JNK0010
rows.name: Deflect

rows.label: tev000593_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gwin about his childhood dream instead.

rows.label: tev000593_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: tev000593_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Gwin it's too embarrassing to share.

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0021
rows.name: ...Me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0022
rows.name:
To be honest, I couldn't see anything beyond the here
and now when I was a kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0023
rows.name:
I had all sorts of hobbies and stuff, but never really
had a strong desire to...you know. BE anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0024
rows.name:
But when I met Leon—that's Lieutenant Irina's brother—
he inspired me to start making goals for the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0025
rows.name: Don't know that I'd call any of them "dreams," though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0026
rows.name: Wow, you're that ashamed of it? It must be terrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000593_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'm dying to know, but if you don't want to talk about
it, I'll let it go.[ST:wait ]
